channel.title: Microsoft for Developers
channel.description: Empowering every developer with trusted Microsoft insights

item.title: 【View and manage git tags】查看和管理git标签
item.description: 【Are you tired of switching between your IDE and command-line tools to manage Git tags? We’ve got the perfect solution for you! With the latest update, Visual Studio empowers you to seamlessly view and manage Git tags directly within the Git Repository window. This streamlined workflow ensures you remain within the familiar environment of the […]】您是否厌倦了在IDE和命令行工具之间切换以管理GIT标签？我们为您提供了完美的解决方案！通过最新更新，Visual Studio使您能够直接在GIT存储库窗口中无缝查看和管理GIT标签。这个简化的工作流程确保您保持在[…]的熟悉环境中

item.title: 【Improve the security of Generation 2 VMs via Trusted Launch in Azure DevTest Labs】通过Azure DevTest Labs中的可信赖发布来提高2代VMS的安全性
item.description: 【We’re thrilled to announce the public preview of the Trusted Launch feature for Generation 2 (Gen2) Virtual machines (VMs) in Azure DevTest Labs! 🌟 This game-changing feature is designed to enhance security of virtual machines (VMs), protecting against advanced and persistent attack techniques. Here are the key benefits: Securely deploy VMs with verified boot loaders, OS kernels, […]】我们很高兴宣布Azure DevTest Labs中的2（Gen2）虚拟机（VMS）的可信赖发射功能的公开预览！ 🌟这种改变游戏的功能旨在增强虚拟机（VM）的安全性，以防止先进和持久的攻击技术。这是关键好处：使用经过验证的引导加载器，OS内核安全地部署VM，[…]

item.title: 【Getting Started with Claude models on Azure Databricks】Azure Databricks上的Claude模型入门
item.description: 【Introduction Following up on the exciting announcement about Anthropic’s state-of-the-art models becoming available to Azure Databricks customers, this post provides a detailed, step-by-step guide on how you can start using Claude 3.7 Sonnet model directly within your Azure Databricks environment using Model Serving. We’ll walk through deploying the necessary Azure Databricks workspace, finding the Claude […]】介绍，介绍了关于Anthropic的最先进模型的令人兴奋的公告，该帖子提供了有关如何在Azure Databricks环境中直接使用Claude 3.7 SONNET模型开始使用模型服务的详细的，分步的指南。我们将逐步部署必要的Azure Databricks工作区，找到Claude […]

item.title: 【Modernizing push notification API for Teams】为团队现代化推送通知API
item.description: 【Push Notification Hub is an essential internal service that plays a crucial role in the messaging and calling flows within Teams and other platforms. This article describes its recent overhaul, which has significantly enhanced its performance and reduced latencies in delivering push notifications to user devices】Push Notification Hub是必不可少的内部服务，在团队和其他平台内的消息传递中起着至关重要的作用。本文描述了其最近的大修，该大修大大提高了其性能，并减少了向用户设备发出推送通知的潜伏期

item.title: 【Microsoft Graph APIs for permanent deletion of mailbox items now available】Microsoft Graph API，用于永久删除邮箱项目现已可用
item.description: 【We’re happy to announce the general availability (GA) of the permanent delete APIs for contacts, messages, and events as well as for contact folders, mail folders, and calendars.】我们很高兴宣布永久删除API的一般可用性（GA），用于联系人，消息和事件以及联系文件夹，邮件文件夹和日历。

item.title: 【Go 1.24.2-1 and 1.23.8-1 Microsoft builds now available】GO 1.24.2-1和1.23.8-1 Microsoft现在可用
item.description: 【A new release of the Microsoft build of Go including security fixes is now available for download.】现在可以下载Microsoft Go Build的新版本。

item.title: 【Important Update: Server Name Indication (SNI) Now Mandatory for Azure DevOps Services】重要更新：Azure DevOps服务的服务器名称指示（SNI）
item.description: 【Earlier this year, we announced an upgrade to our network infrastructure and the new IP addresses you need to allow list in your firewall – Update to Azure DevOps Allowed IP addresses – Azure DevOps Blog. This is our second blog post to inform you that starting from April 23rd, 2025, we will be requiring […]】今年早些时候，我们宣布了对网络基础架构的升级以及您需要在防火墙中允许列表的新IP地址 - 更新到Azure DevOps允许的IP地址 - Azure DevOps Blog。这是我们的第二篇博客文章，通知您，从2025年4月23日开始，我们将需要[…]

item.title: 【Exact Nearest Neighbor (ENN) Vector Search for Precise Retrieval】确切的最近邻居（ENN）矢量搜索精确检索
item.description: 【In applications such as personalized recommendations and scientific research, accurately identifying the closest data points to a given query is crucial. Traditional methods like Approximate Nearest Neighbor (ANN) search offer faster retrieval times by approximating results but may sacrifice accuracy, leading to potential errors in scenarios where precision is essential. This trade-off between speed and […]】在诸如个性化建议和科学研究之类的应用中，准确地确定最接近给定查询的数据点至关重要。传统方法（例如近似最近的邻居（ANN）搜索）通过近似结果可提供更快的检索时间，但可能会牺牲准确性，从而在精度至关重要的情况下导致潜在的错误。速度和[…]之间的这种权衡

item.title: 【The return of Building 7】建筑物7的回归
item.description: 【Pranksters lose one of their longtime inside jokes.】恶作剧者失去了他们的长期笑话。

item.title: 【Building AI Applications with Memory: Mem0 and Azure AI Integration】使用内存构建AI应用：MEM0和Azure AI集成
item.description: 【Learn how to integrate Mem0 with Azure AI Search and Azure OpenAI to create AI applications with persistent memory capabilities across conversations.】了解如何将MEM0与Azure AI搜索和Azure OpenAI集成，以创建具有持续的内存功能的AI应用程序。
